about_title: About Do Best | Moving & Cleaning Helsinki
about_sub: Trusted Moving Services in Helsinki, Espoo & Vantaa
about_int: Welcome to Do Best, where professional moving services meet reliability and excellence. Founded in December 2022, we've quickly built a reputation as one of the most trusted moving companies in Helsinki, Espoo, and Vantaa, delivering 100% customer satisfaction with every service.
about_miss: At Do Best, we understand that moving can be overwhelming. Whether you're relocating to a new home, moving your office, or need a deep cleaning service, our expert team is here to make the process smooth, fast, and stress-free.
service_moving_long: House & Home Moving – Reliable local & long-distance moves across Finland and the Schengen area (with Helsinki, Espoo, or Vantaa as the starting point or destination).
service_cleaning_eco: Deep Cleaning Services – Eco-friendly and thorough cleaning for homes, offices, and rental apartments.
service_pro_install: Furniture Installation – Fast and precise assembling of flat-pack furniture and installation/removal of appliances.

about_contact: Ready to make your move or get your space sparkling clean?
faq_desc: Find answers to common questions about our moving services
q_book: How can I book your services?
a_booked:
Booking is simple! You can either:
Request a Free Quote online
Call us at +358-414807333
Email us at info@doest.fi
WhatsApp us
Or Telegram us
q_pay: What payment methods do you accept?
a_payment: We accept all MobilePay, bank transfers, and cash payments. All invoices include VAT and are clearly itemized.
q_resc: Can I reschedule or cancel my booking?
a_reschedule: Yes, we understand that plans can change. You can cancel your booking free of charge if you notify us at least 5 days in advance. If you need to reschedule, please contact us at least 1 day before your scheduled service, and we'll make our best to accommodate your new preferred time.
q_ins: Are your staff insured and trained?
a_insured: Absolutely! All our staff are professionals and covered by insurance, ensuring your belongings and property are safe in our hands.
q_area: What areas do you provide moving services in?
a_are: We offer moving services in Helsinki, Espoo, and Vantaa, and we can also handle long-distance moves anywhere in Finland or the Schengen area, as long as the starting point or destination is one of these three cities.
q_pack: Do you offer packing and unpacking services?
a_packing: Yes! Our team provides professional packing and unpacking services to ensure your belongings are safe during transport. We use high-quality packing materials and handle everything from fragile items to large furniture.
q_off: Can you help with office relocations?
a_office: Absolutely! We specialize in office moving services and can assist with packing, disassembling office furniture, and setting up your new space efficiently.
q_insure: Are my belongings insured during the move?
a_insurance: Yes, all moves are covered by basic insurance. Home insurance plays a crucial role in safeguarding your belongings during a move. It is recommended to ensure that your home insurance policy includes coverage for damages that may occur during packing, carrying, and moving. Additionally, road transport insurance provides coverage for damages during transit, with compensation typically capped at €20/kg. We advise maintaining comprehensive home insurance to cover any unforeseen incidents during the move, with the assurance that we will assist with the insurance deductible in the event of an accident. For more information, visit: https://www.muuttomaailma.fi/kotivakuutus-ja-muutto-6
q_disc: Can I book multiple services together for a discount?
q_recur: Regular cleaning services for offices and homes?
a_recur: Yes! We offer monthly and periodic cleaning plans for offices and homes. Contact us to discuss your needs.

a_moving_clean: Our move-out cleaning covers everything needed to get your apartment or house ready for
a_cleaning_dur: Duration depends on the size and condition of the space.
q_clean_gar: Do you guarantee your cleaning services?
a_cleaning_gar: Yes! We offer a satisfaction guarantee.
q_applet_install: Do you offer installation and removal services?
a_inst: Yes! We offer professional installation and removal services for household appliances.
